text: Hello all, if you or any android dev you know are in the Portland, OR area looking for *contract* work, please DM me. We are a local IoT company & are taking on some new clients in the next few months. <https://www.rigado.com/>
Hey <@U2FQMDA31>, would you please post a full job description? More info, see the topic.

Yep! As much as I can.. Level : Mid, Remote : No, Location : Rigado, 1001 Water Ave, Portland, OR. I don’t have a job description right now, not on the website, yet. This is not a contract-to-hire position, strictly for a client app. We are an IoT company and generally our client apps interface with bluetooth. If you are interested let me know and I will pass along the description when it’s finalized !
Thanks :slightly_smiling_face: I just asked so it's more clear to everyone here.

text: <@U061HDV96|andreasbackx> pinned a message to this channel.
<@U2FQMDA31> happen to be open to internships this Spring?
I don’t know. We had an intern over the summer and that worked out pretty well. Feel free to send me your info & interests and I can pass it along.
We are a very small android team, so it will depend on our workload but we try to give back as much as possible
He is a little rough around the edges, but all in all very hardworking
